byEmail.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user'
    emit doc.email.toLowerCase(), null

byUsername.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user' or doc.special
    emit doc.username.toLowerCase(), null

byCreation.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user'
    emit doc.created, doc.username

nextSummary.map:
(doc)->
  unless doc.type is 'user' then return
  if doc.settings.notifications.global is false then return
  if doc.settings.notifications['inventories_activity_summary'] is false then return
  if doc.undeliveredEmail > 1 then return

  lastSummary = doc.lastSummary or doc.created
  summaryPeriodicity = doc.summaryPeriodicity or 20
  nextSummary = lastSummary + summaryPeriodicity*24*3600*1000
  emit nextSummary, null

byGeoSquare.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user' and doc.position?
    [lat, lng] = doc.position
    lat = Math.floor lat
    lng = Math.floor lng
    emit [lat,lng], null
